column.name: QUELLSYSTEM
column.comment: Indikator, aus welchem System der Datensatz stammt (2:  Debit, 3: Credit).

column.name: MARKET_CODE
column.comment: Markt, dem der Kunde zugeordnet ist. Beispiele sind MMC (Credit Kunden, die einen Vertrag mit VfD2 haben), PUC (Credit Kunden, die einen Vertrag mit einem Partnerunternehmen haben), MMO (Prepaid Kunden, die direkt VfD2 zugeordnet sind), PUA (Prepdaid Kunden, die einem Partnerunternehmen zugeordnet sind), XMK (Cross Market).

column.name: TARIFF_OPTION
column.comment: TARIFF_OPTION from KIAS2000

column.name: EFFECTIVE_DATE
column.comment: effektives Änderungsdatum

column.name: SYS_CREATION_DATE
column.comment: Datum der Erstellung des Datensatzes im operativen System, Format 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'

column.name: SYS_UPDATE_DATE
column.comment: Datum der Modifikation des Datensatzes im operativen System, Format 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'

column.name: OPERATOR_ID
column.comment: Eindeutige ID des letzten Benutzers

column.name: APPLICATION_ID
column.comment: Eindeutige ID der Applikation, die den Satz als letztes bearbeitet hat

column.name: TARIFF
column.comment: Ein Tarif bündelt mehrere Tarif-Optionen, die als solches Bündel an den Endkunden verkauft werden können.

column.name: TO_DESC_CODE
column.comment: This field will aggregate the description of one or more Tariff Options. The description will be taken from TO_DESC entity.

column.name: CONTRACT_TYPE
column.comment: The contract type associated with the SOC, refers to CONTRACT_TYPE table.

column.name: PP_CODE
column.comment: Eindeutiger Schluessel fuer den Preisplan des Teilnehmers.

column.name: DISCOUNT_GROUP_CODE
column.comment: The discount program code for the Group.

column.name: EU_ACT_FEE
column.comment: The activation fee.

column.name: SALE_EFF_DATE
column.comment: This field defines the date from which the item is available for sale.

column.name: SALE_EXP_DATE
column.comment: This field defines the date from which the item is no longer available for sale.

column.name: EXPIRATION_DATE
column.comment: Ablaufdatum

column.name: SERVICE_LEVEL
column.comment: This attribute defines the level of service provided by this feature respective tariff option · B - Ban · C - Subscriber

column.name: ROUNDING_RULE_CD
column.comment: Rounding rule code is the link to the default rounding rule containing minimum call duration and the subsequent rounding factor

column.name: CREDIT_TYPE
column.comment: This attribute specifies if the TO may be for any credit type or a specific (Credit, PrePaid) type. Valid Values: C - Credit P - Pre-paid

column.name: PAYMENT_METHOD
column.comment: This attribute specifies if the TO may require a specific payment type (e.g., direct debit). Valid Values: D - Direct debit C - Cash S - Salary deduction Null - all

column.name: PRODUCT_FAMILY
column.comment: This attribute identifies a Product Family.

column.name: ACCT_FOR_RC_IND
column.comment: Indicates whether the Tariff Option is accountable for the calculation of tiered recurring charge by number of subscribers. This indicator is valid only in Subscriber level.

column.name: ACCT_FOR_DISC_IND
column.comment: Indicates whether the Tariff Option is eligible for Accountable categories of Discount.

column.name: DISCOUNTABLE_IND
column.comment: Indicates if the item is eligible for discounts.

column.name: SK_ONLY_IND
column.comment: Indicates whether this Tariff Option is only dedicated to Skeleton Contract subscribers.

column.name: FUTURE_GROUP_SOC
column.comment: The future group SOC field defines the name of the SOC that will be attached to a customer if he joins a Group.

column.name: DEBIT_TO_CREDIT_IND
column.comment: Indicates whether this Tariff Option can be selected for a debit Tariff customer who is migrating to credit.

column.name: SUBSID_HANDSET_IND
column.comment: This attribute indicates if the subscriber of this TO is eligible for a subsidised-handset.

column.name: DESCRIPTION
column.comment: Beschreibung

column.name: ALLOWED_NUM_OF_MONTH
column.comment: There are special TO that must expire after a certain time and be replaced with another TO. e.g.: Schnuper.

column.name: TO_AFTER_EXP
column.comment: The Tariff Option applied to a customer after the current one is expired.

column.name: TO_STATUS
column.comment: This attribute defines whether the SOC or Price Plan (PP) preparation has been completed (Active) or is currently in-work (Draft). SOCs or PPs that are active can be sold to customers, depending on the SOC entity effective and expiration dates. SOCs or PPs that are in-work status cannot be sold until they are changed to active. The SOC or PP status can change from in-work to active, but not from active to in-work. · A

column.name: CAMPAIGN_TO_CODE
column.comment: An Oracle sequence used to map each tariff option to a campaign code.  Used in the mass tariff option change routines.

column.name: INTERNAL_TO_IND
column.comment: Indicates whether this is an internal tariff option or a Fixed Net provider tariff option Y - Internal N - Fixed Net

column.name: DEF_TO_FOR_FIXED
column.comment: The default tariff option that should be sent to the Fixed-Net provider if the tariff option is Internal.

column.name: TWIN_STAR_RELEVANT
column.comment: Indicates whether the tariff option grants its subscriber twin star benefits when the subscriber also has GSM services.

column.name: FN_PRESELECTION
column.comment: Indicates whether or not Arcor preselection already exists.

column.name: AQC_IND
column.comment: Indicates whether the owner of the tariff option is eligible for the  AQC service.

column.name: SPECIAL_PURPOSE_TO
column.comment: The special purpose of the tariff option, if any. A - Corporate Access O - Corporate Onsite - ‘Z’ for Zuhause Tariff Option

column.name: D2PC_ALLOWED_IND
column.comment: Indicator if D2PC is allowed

column.name: DEALER_COMM_DISC_IND
column.comment: Indicates whether the dealer commission is relevant or not

column.name: TO_STANDARD_IND
column.comment: Indikator

column.name: CHANGE_EXP_DATE
column.comment: The change expired date of the tariff_option.

column.name: BPN_CALCULATION_IND
column.comment: Indicator for BPN calculation. - Valid values 'Y' - Yes and 'N' - No.  For the existing tariff options the new field BPN_CALCULATION_IND must be patched to 'N'.

column.name: MAX_BAL_EXP_PER
column.comment: Maximal Balance Expiration Period

column.name: UPS_CED_TRX_IND
column.comment: Indicator of creation UPS transaction 'CED'.

column.name: DAYS_PER_EURO_FACT
column.comment: Factor of days per Euro of DCC increase

column.name: MAX_PPD_BAL_EXP_CAN
column.comment: Maximal Prepaid Balance Cancelation Period

column.name: DAYS_BEFORE_CAN
column.comment: Number of days before Subscriber  Cancelation on DCC

column.name: ATM_RECH_ALLOWED_IND
column.comment: Indicates if ATM recharge is allowed for this tariff.

column.name: CN_RECH_ALLOWED_IND
column.comment: Indicates if Cash Net recharge is allowed for this tariff.

column.name: DP_LEVEL_SET
column.comment: Degressive Pricing Level Set

column.name: LINK_TYPE
column.comment: Link type of tariff option

column.name: DSL_ALLOWED_IND
column.comment: Indicator for DSL allowance - The column will be filled with ‘N’ if a subscriber that has this tariff option is not  eligible to have a DSL subscriber linked.

column.name: STU_BARR_IND
column.comment: Barring indicator for STU functionality - Indicator which shows whether the Tariff Option is Barred from Using STU functionality or not.

column.name: SB_IND
column.comment: Indicates that the tariff option assigned to the subscriber is marked as SB relevant in TARIFF_OPTION table

column.name: SUBSID_CONTRACT_DUR
column.comment: Subsidized contract duration in months

column.name: SBZ_SOC_REFR_IND
column.comment: If set to 'Y' the TO included SOCs are refreshed when a subsidized handset activity is performed.

column.name: TO_CARD_TYPE
column.comment: The indicator is set to ‘DC’ when the corresponding TARIFF_OPTION is Data Card specific. Valid Values: DC, NULL

column.name: TO_SEGMENT_TYPE
column.comment: To be used in a future project, not relevant for the current project
